title: How to Draw Like a Fashion Designer

steps.headline: Sketch a circle for the head.
Draw the shape of the face.
Add the guidelines for the body.
steps.description: Use a triangle-like curve for the upper part of body. Draw a circle for the hips.

steps.headline: Add the basic outline of the dress.
Draw the basic features of the face.
Draw the hair as you like.
Add more accessories if you like.
steps.description: You can draw accessories like gloves and necklaces.

steps.headline: Draw a model on the front and the back of a sheet of card or paper.
Make lines around the model drawing a design.
steps.description: Let your imagination go wild.Just try put a picture on to your mind first and then try drawing it!

steps.headline: Wrap it up.
steps.description: Designing is really fun. But too much embellishment is just too much. It's easy to get carried away, even the simplest outfits are the coolest.

steps.headline: Remember, this is your work, you can do anything, as long as it's yours.
steps.description: Getting inspiration is great and helps a lot, but make something you would wear. Draw a similar outfit, but make it more you. Have fun, it's all yours.

tyn: A pencil to sketch the designs
text: Elegant Dress Sketch a circle for the head.  Draw the shape of the face.  Add the guidelines for the body. Use a triangle-like curve for the upper part of body. Draw a circle for the hips. Add the basic outline of the dress.  Draw the basic features of the face.  Draw the hair as you like.  Draw details on the clothes.  Add more accessories if you like. You can draw accessories like gloves and necklaces. Erase the draft lines.  Color.  Sketch Style Draw a model on the front and the back of a sheet of card or paper.  Make lines around the model drawing a design. Let your imagination go wild.Just try put a picture on to your mind first and then try drawing it! Wrap it up. Designing is really fun. But too much embellishment is just too much. It's easy to get carried away, even the simplest outfits are the coolest. Remember, this is your work, you can do anything, as long as it's yours. Getting inspiration is great and helps a lot, but make something you would wear. Draw a similar outfit, but make it more you. Have fun, it's all yours.
